reviewtext: i bought this because when i do my volunteer work it is extremely hard to hear. so with this one i could hear everything that goes over the radio. THIS IS A 1 PIN REMOTE SPEAKER. YOUR RADIO NEEDS TO HAVE A SLOT FOR 1 PIN TO USE THIS.pro.-built nicely-able to have the radio on low and still be able to hear everything (keep in mind of the noise around you)-push to talk built incon-i use a safety pin so i could attach it my uniform better. may pull the clothes down a bit (need to break in the wires has to be looser) this is something smallthis does have a clip on the back of the speakers but i dont like to use it.overallprice cheaper now compared to when it first name came out (about $15 less)sound goodjust overall its very good.i would recommend this.
